author: Special Correspondent
text:
Twenty five passengers were injured in a road accident involving a State Transport Corporation bus and a private bus on the Tiruchi–Pudukottai national highway near Gundur on Tuesday.

Police sources said the private bus tried to overtake a container lorry and hit a roadside tree. The STC bus hit the lorry.

The private bus was coming from Pudukottai while the STC bus was on its way to Karaikudi.

The Navalpattu police are investigating.
title: 25 injured in road accident as two buses collide
